translated: The explanation of the meaning of the root tantra is the explanation of the meaning of the root tantra, the glorious Compendium of Principles, in terms of the thirty-seven topics that are set forth and clarified at the beginning and end of the root tantra.

analyzed: 'gyur ba dang / nor dang zas skom la sogs pa 'dod pa lnga la chags shing dam tshig mi bsrung ba rnams kyang de dag ci bde bar spyod du gnang bar byas nas dkyil 'khor du bcug cing lha'i sbyor ba goms par byas na de dag kyang rim gyis mngon par 'byung
translated: Those who are attached to the five desirable qualities, such as wealth, food, and drink, and do not guard their sacred pledges, are also permitted to enjoy those desirable qualities. analyzed: de ltar chos kyi phyag rgya de yin no bar bshad pa de yang rang bzo ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir khungs gsungs pa /

original: 'di ltar gzhan dag las kyang gsung gi gsang ba bshad pa ni chos kyi phyag rgya nyid du ston te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzhan dag las kyang gsung gi gsang ba bshad pa ni chos kyi phyag rgya nyid du ston te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /

original: de la gsung gi gsang ba zhes pa ni /
analyzed: de la gsung gi gsang ba zhes pa ni /
translated: Therein, the secret of speech is as follows.

original: gsang ba ni tshig kyang gzhan la don kyang gzhan du ston pa lta bu'i mtshan nyid la ni gsang ba zhes bya ste /
analyzed: gsang ba ni tshig kyang gzhan la don kyang gzhan du ston pa lta bu'i mtshan nyid la ni gsang ba zhes bya ste /

analyzed: chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin las mtshan nyid gzhan du ston pa la yang gsang ba zhes bshad do //

translated: In this context, it is said that the secret is the teaching of the consecration of the syllables called dharma-mudra from the pure nature of speech.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni 'og nas bshad do//
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni 'og nas bshad do//

analyzed: tshig ces pa ni chos kyi phyag rgya'i yig 'bru rnams te de ni smra ba lta bu ste /

original: de gnyis tha mi dad pas na /
analyzed: de gnyis tha mi dad pas na /
translated: Since those two are not different,

analyzed: de'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan ma zhes pa ni gsung rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan ma 'am rtags su gyur pa ni chos kyi yig 'bru'o //
